  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.lang.String apiKey
    The api key for authorization, null when disabled.
    protected java.lang.String apiSecret
    The api secret for authorization, null when disabled.
    java.lang.String baseURL
    The base URL of the Codeforces API, override it if ever needed.
    protected com.google.gson.Gson gson
    The gson instance used for deserializing the responses (from JSON).
    protected java.util.Random randomGenerator
    The random generator for the authorization string, seed initialized into the system time.
    java.time.Duration timeout
    Requests timeout duration.

  • Method Details

    • calculateSHA512

      public static java.lang.String calculateSHA512​(java.lang.String input)
      Calculate SHA-512 of a string. Sourced from https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/sha-512-hash-in-java/.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to hash.
      Returns:
      The SHA-512 hash in HEX format.

    • requestUsersInformation

      public User[] requestUsersInformation​(java.lang.String handles) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException, CFException
      Returns information about one or several users.
      Parameters:
      handles - Semicolon-separated list of handles. No more than 10000 handles is accepted.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of User objects for requested handles.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException
      CFException

    • request

      public java.lang.String request​(java.lang.String methodName, java.lang.String parameters) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Execute a HTTP request on CodeForces's API.
      Parameters:
      methodName - The name of the API method to execute.
      parameters - The request's parameters url encoded.
      Returns:
      The response body.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - by HTTP operations.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - when interrupted while requesting

    • generateRandomString

      protected java.lang.String generateRandomString()
      Generates a 6 characters string of random characters for usage in authorization.
      Returns:
      A 6 characters string of random characters.

    • authorize

      protected java.lang.String authorize​(java.lang.String methodName, java.lang.String packedParameters)
      Calculates the authorized endpoint for a CodeForces request. Reference: https://codeforces.com/apiHelp
      Parameters:
      methodName - The request's method name.
      packedParameters - The parameters of the request, can be an empty string.
      Returns:
      The authorized endpoint with parameters embedded, valid for about 5 minutes.
